name: Gotham Shadow
description:
Gotham Shadow is a Pacman type of game, taking part in the Batman universe.

/* GENERAL */

Play the game and discover the most emblematic protagonists of this universe ! You can choose your start character, with 2 differents mode :

- Adventure (play every stage in a row)

- Discover (pick the stage you want)

/* GAMEPLAY */

Use keyboard arrows to move your player.

/* CREDITS */

Players and enemies sprites :
artemxvx https://www.deviantart.com/artemxvx/gallery

GeneStarwolf https://www.deviantart.com/genestarwolf/gallery

Fonts : 

American Captain & Winter in Gotham on Dafont.
